humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the largest dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is 1.8 cm (see (A) Right breast, needle-localized segmental mastectomy). Using the rules provided, a T1 tumor is 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has invasive ductal carcinoma that measures 1.8 cm in the largest dimension, which falls under T2 staging (T2: Tumor size > 2 cm and ≤ 5 cm). Although the tumor approached the anterior margin in the initial segmental mastectomy specimen, this tissue was re-excised and found to be free of tumor, so tumor does not approach the final surgical margins. The tumor is also 5 mm from the nearest deep margin. Therefore, the T stage is T2.
